description: This file contains unit tests for the MCPTools and MultiMCPTools classes in the agno.tools.mcp module. It tests various error conditions and input validation scenarios using pytest and mocking.

methods.name: test_sse_transport_without_url_nor_sse_client_params
methods.description: Tests that ValueError is raised when MCPTools is initialized with transport='sse' without URL or server_params.

methods.name: test_stdio_transport_without_command_nor_server_params
methods.description: Tests that ValueError is raised when MCPTools is initialized with transport='stdio' without command or server_params.

methods.name: test_streamable_http_transport_without_url_nor_server_params
methods.description: Tests that ValueError is raised when MCPTools is initialized with transport='streamable-http' without URL or server_params.

methods.name: test_empty_command_string
methods.description: Tests that ValueError is raised when MCPTools is initialized with an empty command string.

methods.name: test_multimcp_without_endpoints
methods.description: Tests that ValueError is raised when MultiMCPTools is initialized without endpoints.

methods.name: test_multimcp_empty_command_string
methods.description: Tests that ValueError is raised when MultiMCPTools is initialized with an empty command string.

methods.name: test_mcp_include_exclude_tools_bad_values
methods.description: Tests that _check_tools_filters raises ValueError when include_tools or exclude_tools contain invalid values.
